mapper.select: select ord.id as orderId,ord.pay_amount as orderAmount,u.wx_nk_name as wxNkName,item.id as itemId,item.sku_id as skuId,item.sku_name as skuName, re.level as level,item.create_time as createTime from sf_order ord LEFT JOIN sf_order_item item on ord.id = item.sf_order_id LEFT JOIN sf_user_relation re on ord.user_id = re.user_id LEFT JOIN com_user u on ord.user_id = u.id where ord.shop_user_id = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ord.is_counting = 1 and item.create_time >= #{start,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and item.create_time <= #{end,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

select count(*) as count ,sum(re.level) as sumLevel from sf_order ord LEFT JOIN sf_order_item item on ord.id = item.sf_order_id LEFT JOIN sf_user_relation re on ord.user_id = re.user_id LEFT JOIN com_user u on ord.user_id = u.id where ord.shop_user_id = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ord.is_counting = 1 and item.create_time >= #{start,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and item.create_time <= #{end,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
